content: Somehow, the news surrounding the meeting of a (stable?) Chinese leader and a (perhaps unstable?) U.S. president sounds akin to any previously stable U.S. president visiting a dogmatic, unstable leader of some other country. I wish I could shake this feeling of insecurity and uneasiness. It will be enlightening to see what tidbits are released by the White House and mainstream media about this meeting. Methinks it will not go well for our “leader.”
